# User Exam 

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## What is  user exam?
In this application, user can give their exam online.

## How to run userexam application?
You can run userexam application:
1) npm install
2) For run backend project: 
  a) Goto backend => examportal
  b) run node app.js or nodemon app.js
2) For run backend project:
  a) Goto frontend => examportal
  b) run ng start
3) MongoDb is required to run this project.
